Shazia is married and the mother of four children. All of them are enrolled in a local school and are getting their education. 

Her husband is involved in the dairy business. He has a buffalo, from which he gets milk and sells to community clients and milk shops to earn a better income.  

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for her husband’s dairy business. With the loan investment, he will buy another buffalo for getting a larger quantity of milk to sell to his clients. 

He is an experienced person in his business and well known among his community people for his good quality services and professional behavior. 

Shazia is confident that by purchasing another buffalo, her husband will successfully be able to put his business in a more profitable position. 

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Shazia.

loans.use: to buy another buffalo for her husband's dairy business.

loans.name: Hugo Hernan

texts.es:
Hugo siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y querer ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Casado y con 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer un buen estudio, Hugo tiene un cultivo de verduras y legumbres el cual aprendió a trabajar desde muy temprana edad, pues su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y desde muy joven se la enseñó. Hugo siempre se esfuerza para que su negocio crezca y le genere ingresos con los cuales pueda sostener a su familia, y gracias a este esfuerzo es que ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes con la buena atención y la buena calidad de sus productos. Huego, con la finalidad de seguir creciendo su negocio, busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de abonos y riegos para su cultivo y poder sacar productos de una buena calidad.

Hugo espera que de esta manera supere las dificultades que le ha traído los fuertes inviernos, y así siga ofreciendo a sus clientes unos productos de buena calidad. Hugo sueña con ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y a sus hijos un estudio de mejor calidad, además, sueña con poder adquirir su propio vehículo para poder transportar sus productos hacia sus clientes y evitar pagar los altos costos del transporte.
texts.en:
Hugo has always been known for being hard working and wants to offer his family a better quality of life. He is married with 2 children, and he always wanted to offer them a good education.  Hugo has a crop of vegetables and legumes, which he learned how to grow from an early age because his father was engaged in this activity and taught him from a young age.  Hugo is always striving to grow his business and generate income with which to support his family.  Thanks to his effort he has captured a large number of customers with good service and the high quality of his products.  

In order to continue growing his business, Hugo is looking for a loan to give him the ability to purchase fertilizers and irrigation for farming and to make good quality products.  In this way, Hugo hopes to overcome the difficulties brought by harsh winters, and be able to continue to provide his customers with quality products. Hugo dreams of offering his family a better quality of life and their children a higher quality of education.  He also dreams of being able to purchase his own vehicle to transport his products to his customers and avoid paying the high costs of transport.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and irrigation tools for farming and to provide high quality products.

loans.name: Robinah

texts.en: Robinah is 42 years old and a single mother of four children living in Hioma, Uganda. She sells fresh foods and vegetables, a business she has been running for so many years. She faces challenges of seasonal variations and her family goal is to educate her children. She also hopes to expand her business to new markets in the future. She needs the loan to buy fresh foods to sell.

loans.use: to buy fresh foods.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 29 years old. She runs a beauty salon to earn a living. She has been in the business for four years and has employed one person. To earn extra income she sells second hand clothes. She describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to improve her business and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy weaves and a hair dryer.

loans.use: to buy weaves and a hair dryer.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a 40-year-old woman who is single with three children. She has a retail business in Loitokitok. She has been in the business for six years now and gets a monthly income of 17,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). 

This will be Lucy’s first loan with KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to purchase more stock of rice, maize flour, and tea leaves to sell. 

With the profit that she will get, she wants to expand the business. In the future she wants to be able to be a wholesale trader.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice, maize flour, and tea leaves to sell.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is 42 years old and supports her family. She sells clothes and jewelry, a business she started 12 years ago, and earns a monthly income of KES 45,000. 

She is requesting a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase bales of trousers and skirts, as well as jewelry, to sell. The profit she earns from this will be ploughed back into her business. 

Her dream is to prosper in her business. This is her first loan.

loans.use: To purchase bales of trousers, skirts, and jewelry (earrings and necklaces).

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a hardworking single mother of 3 children living in Hioma, Uganda. For 15 years she has been operating a business of buying and selling fresh foods and vegetables. She faces challenge of seasonal weather variations. Her family goals are to educate her children and to achieve self development. She desires to expand her business to new markets. Jane intends to use the loan to buy fresh foods and vegetables to sell.

loans.use: To buy fresh foods and vegetables.

loans.name: Tanazio

texts.en: Tanazio is a 45-year-old married man living in a semi-permanent house in Kyenjojo, Uganda. His desire is to have a family business and build a permanent house for his family. He started as a farmer and later got a store to sell produce, which he has run for seven years. He intends to invest the loan in buying maize produce for his business.

loans.use: to buy maize produce for resell

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 29 years old, married, and has two children. She sells cereals (grains and dried beans) to earn a living. She has been in the business for five years and has employed one person. She also does farming to earn extra income. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy cereals for resale.

loans.use: to buy cereals for resale.

loans.name: Golibjon

texts.ru: Голибчон умный и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих несовершеннолетних детей. Более 2-х лет Голибчон занимается предоставлением услуг по общему питанию. У него своя столовая. Он арендует помещение возле техстанцией. Это местность многолюдная. Он начал свою деятельность в 2010 году. В столовой изготавливают 20 наименований блюд. Имеет несколько работников, которые получают сдельную зарплату. Голибчон запрашивает займ для покупки основных средств: холодильник и витрину. А также на покупку продуктов питания. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Golibjon is a smart and goal-oriented person.  He is married and has three adolescent children.  Golibjon has been involved in providing public food services for over two years.  He owns a cafe.  Golibjon leases a space near a technical station.  This is a well-traveled area.  Golibjon started his business in 2010.  His cafe offers 20 types of dishes.  He has several employees, who earn an piece rate.  Golibjon is requesting this loan to purchase primary resources: a refrigerator and a showcase.  And also to buy food products.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and a showcase

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en: Bernard, aged 34, is a married man living in a semi-permanent house in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He is a farmer and deals in maize production. He dreams of educating his children and building and expanding his plantations. He wants a loan to buy a maize milling machine to enable him to process maize.

loans.use: to buy a maize milling machine.

loans.name: Anzirat

texts.ru:
Анзират 61 год, вдова, воспитала двух сыновей и сейчас заботится о двух внуках.  Будучи ответственным  и очень активным человеком в жизни, Анзират работала бригадиром фермерского хозяйства, и несколько лет назад была избрана председателем сельского суда старейшин села Марказ.  В 1996 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи,  Анзират начала свой бизнес в полеводстве – выращивании лука со стартовой суммой 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Анзират сумела развить свой бизнес  с сезонным доходом  в 50,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях развития своего хозяйства, Анзират  обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян лука и горюче-смазочных материалов.  Доходы от кредита Анзират планирует вложить в дальнейшее  развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Anzirat is 61 years old, a widow, raised two sons and now takes care of two grandsons.  Being a responsible and very active person in life, Anzirat worked as a foreman of a farming business and was elected as the leader of the village elders court in the Markaz village several years ago.  In 1996, in search of a source of income for her family, she started her own farming business - growing onions, with an initial amount of  10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Anzirat's persistence and hard work, she was able to grow her business to have a seasonal income of 50,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Anzirat requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy onion seeds and fuel. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase onion seeds and fuel

loans.name: Aijan

texts.ru: Айжан 40 лет,  воспитывает одну дочь.   В 2004 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи,  Айжан начала свой бизнес в торговле женской одеждой со стартовой суммой в 30,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Айжан сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 25,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, и по этой причине Айжан обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 28,000 сом (KGS).  Доходы от кредита Айжан  планирует вложить в оплату обучения дочери, а в дальнейшем -  в развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Aijan is 40 years old and has one daughter.  In search of a source of income for her family, Aijan started her own business in selling clothing in 2004 with an initial amount of 30,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her persistence and hard work, Aijan was able to grow her business to have a monthly income of 25,000 som (KGS).  Today, there is not a plenitude of merchandise selection, and this is why Aijan requested a loan in the amount of 28,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into paying for her daughter's education and developing her business in the future.

loans.use: to broaden an assortment of goods

loans.name: Augustine

texts.en: Augustine, a 70-year-old married man living in a permanent house in Kyenjojo Uganda, owns a tea  plantation and sells the tea to factories for processing. This former government employee working as a parish chief saved money to plant tea and is now requesting a loan to buy herbicides and manure for his  plantation.

loans.use: to buy herbicides and manure for his tea plantation.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga, de 42 años, es una mujer emprendedora, dinámica y muy creativa, es madre soltera de un niño de 12 años quien es la razón de esfuerzo y sacrificio ya que de ella depende su educación y su alimentación, ella tiene casa propia en donde vive junto a su padre. Olga tiene un trabajo que consiste en la elaboración de la Fariña (un producto regional hecho de harina de yuca), además también se dedica a la venta de la materia prima de la fariña, cuando no hay yuca en cantidad para producir, ella se va a la carretera a buscar a algunos proveedores quienes le venden al por mayor y ella viene a la ciudad a venderlos al por menor. Lleva trabajando ya por ocho años en esta actividad, lo hace sola y como sabe del negocio siempre trae buen producto. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es que no tiene un horario defino, y así comparte tiempo con su padre y su hijo. Sabe que a sus clientes le gusta éste producto crocante así que se esmera en buscar lo mejor de lo mejor para que los tenga contentos. Le está yendo bien aunque subió el precio porque no es temporada pero es pasajero y volverá a bajar. Espera mas adelante poder ampliar su negocio empezando a traer también algunos productos regionales a vender al mercado mayorista. Este será el tercer préstamo con MFP, está muy contenta por que le brindaran un respaldo financiero y así podrá aumentar su capital de trabajo, sabe que tendrá que ser muy responsable y sobre todo muy puntual, está contenta de pertenecer su banco comunal ya que ve que son muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará mas yuca para continuar con su trabajo, además desea venderlo también en la carretera en busca de nuevos clientes.
texts.en: Olga is 42 years old. She is an enterprising, dynamic and creative woman. She is a single-mother of a twelve-year-old child. It is for this child’s education and sustenance that she struggles and sacrifices. She owns a house, where she lives with her father. She makes fariña (a local product made from yucca flour). She also sells the material used in the production of farina. When there aren’t enough yuccas to make the flour, she goes some distance to look for wholesalers who sell yucca. She goes to the city to sell her product at retail prices.  She has been doing this business for the past eight years. She does this business on her own and she always provides a good product. What she likes the best about her work is that she doesn’t have set hours. She is able to spend time with her father and her child. Her customers like this crisp product. This is why she searches for the best of the best ingredients, so that her customers are happy. Her business is going well even though prices have been going up because it is not the yucca season. This is temporary and the prices will go down. In the future she hopes to expand her business by bringing regional products to sell at the wholesale market. This is her third loan with MFP. She is very happy with them as they provide her with financial backing. In this way she can increase her working capital. She knows that she needs to be very responsible and more importantly, very punctual. She is happy to be part of the community bank as they are very united. With this loan of 1500 soles, she will buy yucca in order to continue her business. She would like to sell her product on the highways in order to gain new customers.

loans.use: to buy yuccas.

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en: Vicent has been in the tea business for five years. At the age of 28, he feels he has a lot to achieve, of which building a house for his family is among them. Seasonal weather changes are affecting the business he has done for this long. He dreams of buying a vehicle to enable him to transport green tea leaves to the factory. Vicent wants another loan to buy tea leaves for reselling.

loans.use: to purchase green tea leaves for reselling

loans.name: Victor

texts.en: Victor, aged 43 years, is a married man living in a semi-permanent house in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He is a farmer and deals in Irish potatoes and maize. He dreams of educating his eight children and building and expanding his plantations. He wants a loan to buy maize seeds for planting.

loans.use: to buy maize seedlings for planting

loans.name: Joese

texts.en:
Joese is 50 years old and a single mother of one. She is a poultry farmer and an eggs seller. She has been in the business for the past three years.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a staff member. This is her first loan from KADET LTD. She will use the loan to purchase more chickens and to also buy 40 trays of eggs to boost her stock.

Joese hopes to be a leading poultry farmer in her area.

loans.use: to purchase more chicken and 40 trays of eggs to boost her stock

loans.name: Moses

texts.en: Moses, aged 34 years, is a married man living in a semi-permanent house in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He is a farmer and deals in maize growing. He dreams of educating his four children, and building and expanding his plantations. He wants a loan to buy maize seeds for planting and to pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy maize seeds for planting and to pay for labor

loans.name: Aminjon

texts.ru: Аминчон добрый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых несовершеннолетних детей. Жена занимается оказанием услуг швеи. Аминчон имеет контейнер на рынке и там занимается купле- продажей детской одежды и обуви. В этом бизнесе он уже более 5 лет и имеет богатый опыт. В основном он покупает товар в соседнем городе, а также иногда покупает товар у оптовиков, которые сами привозят на местные рынки. Аминчон хочет расширить свой бизнес и хотел бы получить займ в размере 2000$ США для покупки нового ассортимента детской обуви и одежды. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Aminjon is a kind and goal oriented man. He is married and has four underage children. His wife is providing sewing services. Aminjon has a container on the market where he buys and sells children's clothing and shoes. He has been in this business for more than five years and has a rich experience. He mainly buys the merchandise in the neighboring town as well as from wholesellers who bring the merchandise to the local markets. Aminjon wants to expand his business and wants to take out a loan in the amount of $2,000 USD to buy a new assortment of children's shoes and clothing. He is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: тo buy new assortments of clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 33 años, es una mujer amable, buena y muy responsable, es madre soltera de un niño de ocho años, tiene casa propia en donde comparte su vida a lado de su menor hijo quien depende de ella para su educación y alimentación. Rosa tiene como trabajo el de brindar servicio de costura, todos los días se van a su taller que está en su casa sus clientes en busca de que les haga algún trabajo de costura, pero ella tanbien tiene su propios diseños los cuales son nuevos y novedosos, ella posee dos maquinas de coser y una remalladora, la segunda maquina y la remalladota se pudo comprar trabajando con la institución. Lleva diez años en este trabajo, sin embargo hay temporadas donde no hay mucha demanda, trabaja sola y cuando necesita que le ayuden contrata a dos personas más que saben del trabajo y son buenos en la costura. A rosa siempre le gustó mucho su trabajo, le agrada tener sus creaciones y saber que es libre de hacer sus diseño, ya que tiene muy buenos trabajos. Espera mas adelante tener un taller de costura implementado y empezar a hacer alta costura ya que se prepara a ser proveedora de una tienda grande en la ciudad. Este será el noveno crédito con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero ya que le permitirá estar mas tranquila y avanzar con sus planes de su negocio, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual y sobre todo compenetrarse mas con los integrantes de su banco comunal que son muy solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 2800 soles, comprará materiales para continuar con su trabajo, entre las cosas que necesitan están hilos de diferentes colores, elásticos, y telas, además de refaccionar sus maquinas con algunas piezas nuevas, ya que necesitan mantenimiento por el largo uso que les da.
texts.en: Rosa is 33 years old. She is a friendly, good and responsible woman. She is a single mother of an eight-year-old child. She owns her own house that she shares with her child who is dependent on her for his education and sustenance. Rosa is a seamstress. Everyday she goes to her workshop that is located in her house. Her customers find her when they need some sewing work done. She also makes her own designs that are modern and unique. She owns two sewing machines and a serger. She bought the second sewing machine and the serger when she worked in the industry. She has been doing this job for the past ten years. There are some periods when her business is slow. She works on her own. When she needs extra help she hires two workers who like to work and know how to sew. Rosa has always liked her work. She is thankful to be able to design her own creations, as it is gratifying. She does a lot of good work. In the future she would like to have a sewing workshop where she creates and designs high fashion items. She is hoping to own a big store in the city. This is her ninth loan with MFP. She is happy that she has this financial backing as it gives her peace of mind and allows her to grow her business. She is committed to paying her payments on time. More importantly, she is committed to the members of the community bank, as they are a united group. With this request of 2800 soles, she will buy the materials needed to continue with her work. Among the things that she needs are different colors of thread, elastic and fabric. Also she needs to buy some new parts for her sewing machines so that they can handle the greater usage they require.

loans.use: to buy different colored thread, elastic and fabric. Also, to repair her sewing machines.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en: Virginia is 32 years old and married with 3 children. She sells used clothes to earn a living. She has been in the business for 8 years and has employed one person. She describes her customers as low-income earners because they live in slums. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to improve her business in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy used clothes for selling.

loans.use: to buy used clothes for selling

loans.name: Ibaale Kweterana Group

texts.en: Teddy is a member of Ibaale Kweterana group. She is a 38-year-old married woman with children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She owns a retail shop, which she started five years ago. She got capital from farming. Her major hardship is customers not paying on time. Her dreams are educating her children and diversifying the business. Teddy needs this loan to buy general merchandise, like sugar, for her business.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise for her business

loans.name: Nurizat

texts.ru:
Нуризат 24 года, замужем, имеет 9 – месячного сына. Нуризат занимается полеводством, став опорой для мужа, который ранее вел этот бизнес. Благодаря упорному труду Нуризат в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1,5 га земли, где она выращивает фасоль. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуризат обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку удобрения и горюче-смазочных материалов для пахоты.  Доходы от кредита Нуризат планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства, а в будущем – планирует открыть магазин с продовольственными товарами.
texts.en:
Nurizat is 24 years old, married and has a nine months old son. Nurizat does agriculture supporting her husband who has been running the business earlier. Through Nurizat's hard work her business now has 1,5 hectares of land where she grows beans.

With a goal to further grow her business Nurizat has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 50,000 KGS to buy fertilizer, fuel, oil and lubricants for plowing. Nurizat plans to invest the income from the loan into further expansion of business and in the future she plans to open a grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and fuel.

loans.name: Bilquis' Group

texts.en:
Bilquis has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s scrap business. With the loan investment, he will buy scraps in bulk quantities, which will help him in fulfilling the clients' orders on time and increase his sales and profits. He is very experienced in his business and also provides scraps to other scrap dealers too. 

Bilquis is also a very skillful lady and knows the art of sewing. She prepares beautiful-looking clothes for her community clients, which helps her earn reasonable profits every month.  

Bilquis is hopeful that the loan will be a more productive one for her husband and will increase his sales and income.

loans.use: to buy scraps for a scrap business

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr:
Akossiwa est une femme âgée de cinquante-deux ans. Elle est mariée à un retraité. Elle a quatre enfants, dont deux sont encore à l’école. Le premier a vingt ans et le dernier huit ans.  
La madame travaille comme restauratrice depuis 1986. Elle sert de la nourriture pour ses clients dans un quartier de la place. Elle travaille à la maison et cela lui permet de faire des économies. 
 Elle a requis son dixième crédit de WAGES afin d`investir dans son restaurant. Elle veut élargir son activité avec le crédit.  Dans les prochaines années, elle voudrait aussi investir dans la vente de charbons de bois.
texts.en:
Akossiwa is a 52-year-old woman who is married to a retiree. She has four children, some of whom are still in school. The first child is 20 years old, and the last is 8.

This lady has worked as a restauranteur since 1986.  She serves food for her customers in a local neighborhood. She works out of her house, and this enables her to save money. 

She has requested her tenth loan with WAGES to invest in her restaurant. She wants to use this loan to expand her business. In the next few years, she would also like to invest in selling charcoal.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for food service

loans.name: Abner

texts.es:
Abner, de 58 años, es un hombre bueno, amable y muy responsable, está casado con Predie de 48 años  y tiene dos hijos quienes ya son mayores y personas de bien para la sociedad ya que él les supo dar buenos consejos y buena educación. Vive en su casa propia a lado de su esposa y trabaja mucho para tener una mejor calidad de vida. Durante muchos años, Abner viene desarrollando su trabajo de manera muy responsable, siempre está en el horario adecuado en la casa de los clientes que le solicitan transporte de algún lugar a otro, además de tener todos sus documentos en regla le gusta brindar un buen trato con una sonrrisa calida y atención de primera a sus pasajeros, es por eso que siempre tiene clientes que le llaman a solicitarle sus servicios como mototaxista. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por más de 18 años. Le gusta su trabajo, pues puede manejar su tiempo y acomodarle a como él desee, además de darle el tiempo necesario para cumplir con sus obligaciones de esposo y movilizar a su esposa a hacer las compras del hogar y algunas otras actividades que ella necesita. Le va muy bien, debido a que sabe en que horario empezar a trabajar. Espera seguir trabajando y poder comprar una mototaxi mas y ponerla en alquiler. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, además está muy comprometido en pagar una vez mas con las cuotas a tiempo y de manera responsable, se siente muy cómodo en su banco comunal ya que sus compañeros de grupo son muy responsables y siempre se solidarizan con los demás.
Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará piezas y repuestos para refaccionar su mototaxi, además de pagar al mecánico que le hará el trabajo, también revalidará algunos documentos que están a punto de vencer y desea tenerlos listos antes que sea muy tarde.
texts.en:
Abner is a 58-year-old man. He is good, friendly and responsible. He has been married to Predie for the past 48 years. He has two grown children. His children are good people who contribute to society, as he gave them good advice and a good education. He and his wife own their own house and they work hard to maintain their quality of life. Abner has been very responsible with growing his business. He is always arrives on time at the homes of his clients, who require transportation from one place to another. He has all the permits needed for this work. He always arrives at his customer’s home with a warm smile and dedicated attention. This is why he always has customers that request his motortaxi service. He has been doing this work for the past eighteen years. He like his work as he can manage his own time and work when he desires. It gives him time to meet his familial obligations such as helping his wife with her purchases and with the other activities she needs to do. This works very well, as he knows the hour he needs to begin work. He hopes to continue working, buy another motortaxi and rent it out. This is his second loan with MFP. He would like to continue with this collaboration as it helps him reach his objectives. He promises to pay his payments on time and in a responsible manner. He is happy with the community bank as the members of his group are very responsible and they always cooperate with each other.
With this loan of 1500 soles, he will buy the needed parts to repair his motortaxi. He will also pay the mechanic that does the work. He will renew some licenses that are about to expire, as he wants to have this done before it is too late.

loans.use: to buy the parts in order to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a 57-year-old lady. She is married and has four children. She runs a retail shop in Kimana. She has been in the business for eleven years now and gets a monthly income of 15,300 shillings. 

This will be Josephine’s first loan with KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to purchase more stock of bread, eggs, and maize flour for sale. 

With the profit that she will get, she wants to expand the business. In the future she wants to own a wholesale business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of bread, eggs, and maize flour for selling

loans.name: Hamoud

texts.en: Hamoud is 50 years old, a married man with five children. He lives in Sana'a, Yemen, and has a grocery store. He works hard and has had the business for seven years. He previously leased a store and now owns a store where he has a wide selection of products. It’s at a location that is easily accessed by clients, as there is much pedestrian traffic, and that ensures his sales are good. He wants to expand his business and is requesting a loan of 200,000 Yemeni rials from AMB to buy food products such as rice, sugar, vegetables and soft drinks in order to expand his product selection. In the future, he hopes to buy land to build a house for settlement with his family.

loans.use: to buy food products such as rice, sugar, vegetables and soft drinks for his business.

loans.name: Enyonam

texts.fr:
Enyonam est une femme âgée de 31 ans. Elle est mariée å un directeur de C.E.G. Elle a 1 enfant de huit ans qui va à l’école.
Enyonam travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2005. Elle vend des produits cosmétiques pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir satisfaire toutes les demandes de ses clients.
Enyonam a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits cosmétiques. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Enyonam voudrait élargir son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’améliorer le niveau de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
Enyonam is a 31-year-old woman who is married to a C.E.G. director. She has an 8-year-old child who goes to school. 

Enyonam has been working as a retailer since 2005. She sells cosmetics out of her house. She purchases her products in Lomé and works alone. At the moment, her main difficulty is being unable to meet all the demands of her customers. 

Enyonam has requested her first loan from WAGES for buying cosmetics. She wants to reinvest in her business.

In the next few years, she would like to expand her business. She says she plans on using the profits to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic producdts

loans.name: Carlos

texts.en: Carlos is 30 years old and married with 2 children. He sells basins, plates, cups, and shoes to earn a living. He has been in the business for 9 years and describes his business environment as conducive because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy basins, plates, cups, and shoes for selling.

loans.use: to buy basins, plates, cups, and shoes for selling

loans.name: Mariela Emilce

texts.es:
Gracias la experiencia que adquirió trabajando con su madre en la preparación de masa para arepas, empanadas y otros, decidió montar su propio negocio cuando se casó y desde entonces este ha sido una fuente de ingresos con la cual aporta económicamente a los ingresos de su hogar. Mariela prepara masa para arepas, empanadas, fritos y otros más desde la cocina de su casa, y con los ingresos que esto le genera ha podido ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida para sus 3 hijos y su esposo. Mariela tiene su negocio muy bien acreditado gracias a la buena atención que ofrece y a la buena calida de sus productos, y gracias a esto ha podido captar un gran número de clientes que le permiten tener mensualmente muy buenas ventas. Debido a que se acerca la temporada donde sus ventas aumentan considerablemente, Mariela busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos que requiere para la preparación de la masa y hacerle mantenimiento a su máquina de moler para poder estar preparada para la temporada donde sus pedidos aumentan considerablemente.

Mariela espera que de esta manera sus ingresos sigan aumentando cada vez más y su esposo y sus 3 hijos sigan gozando de una mejor calidad de vida. Además, Mariela espera que con mayores ingresos les pueda ofrecer a sus 3 hijos una mejor educación y mayores oportunidades económicas para su progreso.
texts.en:
Thanks to the experience that she acquired working with her mother in the preparation of corn dough for arepas, empanadas, and other dishes, Mariels decided to set up her own business when she got married, and since then this has been a source of income with which she contributes to the household finances. Mariela prepares dough for arepas (a popular Colombain dish), empanadas, fried snacks, and other items in the kitchen of her house, and with the income that this generates she has been able to offer a better quality of life to her three children and her husband. Mariela has a very well recognized business thanks to the good service that she offers and the good quality of her products, and thanks to this she has been able to attract a large number of customers, which allows her to have very good sales every month. Because the season in approaching in which her sales increase considerably, Mariela is seeking a loan that will offer her the possibility of purchasing ingredients that she needs to prepare the dough and maintaining her milling machine so that she will be prepared for the season when her orders increase considerably.

Maria hopes that in this way her income will continue growing more and more and her husband and three children will continue enjoying a better quality of life. In addition, Mariela hopes that with greater income she can offer her three children a better education and greater economic opportunities for their progress.

loans.use: to buy ingredients that she needs to prepare corn dough and to do maintenance on her milling machine to be ready for the season when her orders increase considerably.

loans.name: Maisa

texts.en: Maisa is looking to improve her family's living conditions. She is requesting a loan of 500 Jordanian dinars to do maintenance on her kitchen. Maisa is a 41-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan. She is the mother of four children. Maisa is a conservative person. She is reluctant to upload her picture on the internet; thus, the man in the photo is her husband.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her kitchen

loans.name: Ada

texts.es: Ada, de 42 años, es una mujer amable, buena y trabajadora, es divorciada, es así que se quedo son sus tres hijos, Luis de 21, Kerry de 20 y Jeremy de 5 años a quienes cría con el apoyo económico que le brinda su ex esposo. Ella vive en su casa propia y trabaja mucho para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Durante los años de casada, ella tenía que disponer de lo que él aportar a su hogar y sentía que le faltaba algo que fuese importante, sentirse útil, y ella misma aportar y hacer muchas cosas, es por eso que decidió  estudiar, así acabó la carrera de docente. Pasando los años cuando se separó, el dinero que el padre de sus hijos le pasaba no alcanzaba para todos los gastos, así que empezó a ejercer la docencia y a tener sus propios ingresos, mientras hacia éste trabajo tuvo algunos contratiempos en la parte economía y es por eso que empezó con nuevos retos. Es así que compró prendas de la ciudad de Lima y los ofrecio a sus amigas, le fue muy bien, tanto así que ahora es una actividad a la que se dedica y le brinda muy buenas ganancias. Lleva realizando su trabajo por más de 3 años y siente que día a día mejora mucho su economía, ahora siente muchas ganas de poner un local en donde pueda atender a sus clientes de manera más cómoda, pero sabe que tiene que ir a paso lento y por ahora solo desea incrementar los diseños y modelos de las prendas que vende. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo, además está convencida que seguirá siendo la socia buena y responsable de los créditos obtenidos anteriormente, le gusta pertenecer al banco comunal al que trabaja ya que todos son responsables y muy solidarios entre si. Con el monto solicitado 800 soles, comprará mas mercadería para continuar con su negocio, comprará prendas de vestir en diferentes modelos y variedad de colores, es así como desea mantener contenta a sus clientes y seguir haciendo negocios con ellos.
texts.en: Ada is 42 years old. She is a friendly, good and hardworking woman. She is divorced with three children. Luis is 21, Kerry is 20 and Jeremy is five years old. She supports them with the help of child support from her ex-husband. She lives in a house that she owns and she works hard to provide a better quality of life for her family. While she was married, she had to support her husband’s work and do many things. When she separated from her husband, child support did not provide enough money to pay for the household expenses. This is why she decided to study to become a teacher and earn her own salary. While she was studying she had some economic setbacks and that is why she started with some new goals. She buys clothing in Lima and sells it to her friends. It went well so she turned this activity into a successful business that provides her with a good income. She has been doing this business for the past three years. Each day her economic situation improves. Now she would really like to open a store where she can provide more comforts for her customers. She knows that she needs to move slowly so for now, she just wants to increase the number of designs and sizes of clothes that she sells. This is her second loan with MFP. She is very happy to have the financial backing so that she can increase her working capital. Also she would like to continue being the good and responsible client she was for her previous loans. She likes to belong to the community bank, as all the members are responsible and united. With this loan of 800 soles, she will buy the merchandise she needs to continue with her business. She will buy clothes in different styles, sizes and colors. This is how she will keep her customers happy and continue having a good business relationship with them.

loans.use: to buy more clothing.

loans.name: Agueda

texts.es:
Agueda, de 58 años, es una mujer buena y trabajadora, está casada con José de 58 años quien es su fiel compañero muchos años, de su matrimonio tiene cuatro hijos a quienes crió y educo hasta que se volvieron independientes y tienen su propia familia, vive en su casa propia en donde trabaja mucho para tener una mejor calidad de vida. Agueda, desde muy temprano, se levanta y comienza su jornada laboral haciendo la limpieza de su hogar, así también abre su pequeño establecimiento en donde ofrece mucha variedad de golosinas y mas a sus clientes quienes siempre van en busca de endulzar al día, además tiene un pequeño taller de costurera en donde se encarga de dar relucir sus dotes creativas y de buen uso de agujas y maquinas, realiza prendas muy lindas además de ser muy novedosas y de buena calidad. Lleva con su trabajo por más de 20 años y todo su trabajo lo hace en su propia casa ya que ahí condicionó un pequeño taller. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, debido a que le permite hacer las tareas del hogar y dispone de su propio tiempo, además le da buenos ingresos, por ello desea seguir con esta actividad y seguir progresando hasta concretar sus planes. Mas adelante desea hacer vestidos y polos para vender. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas a pagar de manera puntual con sus cuotas y demostrar como en anteriores oportunidades que es una socia muy buena y así retribuir el apoyo que le brindan en su banco comunal en donde todos son muy responsables y solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 600 soles, comprará materiales para continuar con su trabajo de costura, además comprará mas golosinas para implementar su venta.
texts.en:
Agueda, who is 58 years old, is a good and hard-working woman. She is married to José, who is 58 and has been her faithful companion for many years. From their marriage they have four children whom they raised and educated until they became independent and had their own families. She lives in her own house, where she works hard to have a better quality of life. Agueda gets up very early and begins her work day by cleaning her house. Then she also opens her little establishment where she offers a great variety of candy and other items to her customers, who are always looking for something to sweeten their day. In addition she has a small sewing workshop where she lets shine her creative gifts and her good use of needles and machines. She makes clothes that are very pretty in addition to being very novel and of good quality. She has been doing her work for more than 20 years, and she does all her work in her own house since she has set up a little workshop there. She likes her work a lot, because it allows her to do her housework and organize her own time, in addition to giving her a good income. For this reason, she wants to continue with this business and continue progressing until she can make her plans a reality. In the future she wants to make dresses and polo shirts to sell. This will be her second loan with MFP, and so she hopes for your assistance to continue with her goals. She also promises once again to make her payments punctually and show, as she did with past opportunities, that she is a very good member (of her communal bank) and thus repay the support that is offered her in her communal bank, where everyone is very responsible and united.

With the 600 PEN that she has applied for, she will buy materials to continue her work as a seamstress, and she will also buy more candies to sell.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials and also candies

loans.name: Martha Lidia

texts.es:
La señora Martha tiene 33 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene tres hijos. Ella se ha dedicado toda su vida a realizar oficios domésticos, pero ya tiene 6 años de laborar como empleada domestica, para llegar a su lugar de trabajo debe recorrer una distancia de 10 kilómetros. Del dinero que gana mantiene a su familia, ella es una persona honesta, responsable, luchadora, objetiva y es una familia unida.

Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar 1000 tejas que cuestan $450 dólares, madera, cuartones, varas de tuza que cuestan $175 dólares y pago de mano de obra valorada en $175 dólares. De esta manera Martha tendrá una casa digna para su familia, puesto que se acerca la época lluviosa y ella quiere estar preparada con un nuevo techo y estar más tranquila con su familia. Ella desea brindarle una mejor vida a su familia, la educación a sus hijos, trabajar en la agricultura, tener una casa más digan y continuar trabajando con la Fundación Campo.
texts.en: Martha is 33 years old. She has a partner and three children. Her whole life she has been working as a housekeeper. For the past six years she has been employed as domestic worker. Her workplace is ten kilometers from home. She supports her family with the income that she earns. She is an honest and responsible person who is struggling to keep her family together. She is asking for this loan to buy 1000 tiles, which will cost $450, wood, beams, “tuza” sticks that cost $175 and labor that costs $175. This is how Martha can have a proper home for her family. The rainy season is starting and she would like to be prepared with a new roof. In this way she will be less stressed for her family. She hopes to improve the lives of her family. She wants to provide her children with a better education. She wants to do agricultural work, have a proper house and continue to work with the Countryside Foundation.

loans.use: to buy 1000 tiles, which will cost $450, wood, beams, “tuza” sticks that cost $175 and labor that costs $175.

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Albert is a fifty-four-year-old man. He is married and has two children. He runs a steel fabrication business in Kangemi. He has been in the business for twenty eight years now and gets a monthly income of twenty thousand shillings.

This will be Albert’s second loan from KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to purchase a grinding machine. With the profit that he will get, he wants to purchase more machines. 

In future he wants to expand the business and support his family.

loans.use: To buy a grinding machine.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en: Simon is 36 years old, married with 2 children. He does carpentry to earn a living. He has been in the business for 15 years and has employed 5 people. He describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to grow his business and hopes to improve his living standards in the future. He has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy timber for making furniture.

loans.use: To buy timber for making furniture

loans.name: Deena

texts.en:
Deena is a 39 years old, a married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan, and a mother of three children.

Deena is looking to improve her family's living conditions thus she is requesting a loan of 400 JD to do maintenance on her home.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her home

loans.name: Maria Doralba

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que toda su vida se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y esto le ha permitido superar las grandes adversidades que le ha presentado la vida. Maria es madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 2 hijos, ya que el padre de sus hijos murió hace un tiempo y la dejó viuda y a cargo de su hogar. Desde entonces, Maria ha venido trabajando fuertemente como empleada doméstica y gracias a esto genera ingresos con los cuales puede sostener los gastos de su hogar, sin embargo, muchas veces los ingresos que genera no son suficientes para cubrir todos los gastos de su hogar, por lo que quiere buscar una manera de generar ingresos adicionales para su familia. Maria desde muy temprana edad aprendió la actividad de la crianza de pollos, pues vivió durante mucho tiempo en una finca y allí adquirió gran experiencia. Con el ánimo de retomar esta actividad, Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a construir un galpón para un criadero de pollos, a la compra de los pollos y la compra del cuido, y así retomar esta actividad con la que podrá generar ingresos extras en su hogar.

Maria espera que de esta manera sus ingresos mensuales sigan aumentando considerablemente, además, podrá generar mayor calidad de vida para sus 2 hijos. Maria sueña con poder tener un gran negocio y que este le permita independizarse por completo y no tener que seguir trabajando como empleada doméstica ya que es muy mal remunerado.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who all her life has been characterized by being very hard-working, and this has permitted her to overcome the great adversities which life has presented her. Maria is a single mother and the head of a family with two children, since the father of her children died some time ago and left her a widow and in charge of the household. Since then, Maria has been working hard as a domestic employee, and thanks to this she generates income with which she can support the household expenses. Nevertheless, many times the income that she generates is not sufficient to cover all the household expenses, and for this reason she wants to look for a way to generate additional income for her family. At a very early age, Maria learned how to raise chickens, since she lived for a long time on a farm, and there she acquired a lot of experience. With the intention of resuming this activity, Maria is seeking a loan that will offer her the possibility of constructing a shed to use as a chicken coop, purchasing chickens and caring for them, and thus resuming this activity with which she will be able to generate extra income in her home.

Maria hopes that in this way her monthly income will continue growing considerably and, in addition, she will be able to create a better quality of life for her two children. Maria dreams of being able to have a big business and that this will allow her to become completely independent and not have to continue working as a domestic employee, since she is very poorly paid.

loans.use: to construct a shed to use as a chicken coop, buy chickens and care for them, and thus resume an activity with which she will be able to generate extra income in her home.

loans.name: Asia

texts.en:
Asia is a 50 years old, a married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan and a mother of six children.

Asia sells clothes out of her home and she is requesting a loan of 800 JD to purchase clothes for business purposes. She is looking to improve her family's living conditions and to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for business purposes

loans.name: Lous

texts.en:
Lous is 53 years old. She is a single parent and has 3 children. She lives with one of her married daughters, son-in-law, and a child in Pouk district of Siem Reap province. She is in the business of cultivating rice and vegetables for sale, earning an average income of USD 5.00 per day.

In order to further develop her business, Lous would like to ask for a loan from HKL to purchase an additional plot of land for crop cultivation. Her dream is to make an improvement of her business and thereby increase her household income.

loans.use: to purchase an additional plot of land for crop cultivation.

loans.name: Cheng

texts.en:
Basket-making business is a main business activity for Cheng, 28, followed by rice farming. She is a single woman who lives with an elderly mother in the Pouk district of Siem Reap province. She learned how to make baskets from her mother.  From this type of business, Cheng is able to earn approximately USD 5.00 per day.  She said that she doesn’t have any worries with this business because there are many customers who are waiting to buy her finished products. The more products she makes, the more money she will earn. 

In order to improve her transportation, Cheng now would like to ask for sufficient funds through HKL to purchase a motorcycle, which she will use to transport her products to the marketplace. This is Cheng's first loan, and she is confident of being able to pay it back punctually.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to transport her products to the marketplace.

loans.name: Mui

texts.en:
Mui is 22 years old and comes from Ornlong Veng district, Siem Reap province. She is married and has a young child. She works as a farmer. She commonly grows rice, potatoes and beans on her existing farmland. For additional income, Mui also owns a general store and sells mixed products like groceries, soft drinks, snacks, sweet things, etc. 

With the amount she requested from Kiva lenders, Mui will pay for plowing and land preparation. Now it’s time to start planting her potato crops. Mui hopes to have a rich harvest in the next few months. She will save some of her income for the future growth of her business.

loans.use: to pay for plowing and land preparation.

loans.name: Khachik

texts.en:
Khachik is a 53-year-old entrepreneur from Yerevan. Khachik lives with his wife, Gayane, who helps her husband with the business, his 20-year-old son, who helps him with sales, and his 17-year-old daughter who is a student. 

About five years ago, Khachik decided to start his own business. He makes shoes and sells them from his little shop. The number of orders has increased recently, and Khachik needs necessary materials to complete them. With the help of this loan Khachik will purchase leather and soles to make shoes. Khachik is sure he will increase sales and gather more income, which he plans to invest in opening a new shop.

loans.use: to pay for leather and soles

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 45 years old, and he does photography to earn a living. He has been in the business for 19 years and has employed one person. He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to grow his business and hopes to own a photo studio in the future. He has applied for 65,000 Kenya Shillings to buy two digital cameras.

loans.use: To buy two digital cameras

loans.name: Josephat

texts.en:
Josephat has a shop selling motor spare parts. He is 38 years old and married to Phylis; they have three children.

Josephat has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD, to enable him to buy  motor spare parts  for sale. He is optimistic that his business will do well.

He hopes to open a bigger shop and own a garage in the future.

loans.use: To buy motor spare parts.

loans.name: Khalida's Group

texts.en:
Khalida has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s livestock business. With the loan investment, he will buy a young buffalo. He will sell it to a butcher or to other buyers after raising it. He may also sell its milk to his community clients to earn extra income.

Khalida is a very active and efficient lady. She remains at home and does her household responsibilities very well. In her spare time, she also gives the cattle feed and keeps their living place clean.

She has given birth to five children.  One of them works while others remain at home and don’t do anything.

Khalida is very confident that the loan investment will be a productive one for her husband’s business and will increase his profits.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Khalida.

loans.use: To buy buffalo for livestock business

loans.name: Vahagn

texts.en:
Vahagn is 30 years old. He lives in Yerevan with his family: his wife, Mery, his 2-year-old son, his father, who is a taxi driver, and his mother, who works at Children Support Center Foundation. 

In 2007 Vahagn got involved in retail business and started selling women's accessories, glasses and wallets. Due to large variety of inventory Vahagn's booth is very popular among young girls and women. Now Vahagn plans to add more inventory and increase sales. With the requested loan he plans to purchase accessories,  glasses, and wallets. 

This loan will help Vahagn to increase the business income and invest in opening a new booth. Such development of the business will allow Vahagn to insure financial stability for his family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for accessories,  glasses, and wallets

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
La señora Sandra tiene 36 años de edad, es divorciada  y tiene tres hijos. Ella vive solo con sus tres hijos ya que su esposo la abandono y se fue para otro país, a pesar de eso ella lucha por sacar adelante a sus hijos y su sueño es que ellos se gradúen de sus estudios y que sean personas de bien para el país.

Sandra se dedica a la cosmetología desde hace cuatro años, ella aprendió este oficio en una academia profesional y posteriormente instalo una sala de belleza. Además se dedica a la venta de productos por catalogo y a atender a sus hijos. Ella se levanta muy temprano a preparar el desayuno y al quehacer del hogar para luego dedicarse a su negocio.

Los productos que necesita para la sala de belleza los compra en la capital del país y viaja dos veces al mes, para llegar ahí, ella aborda dos autobuses y un microbús.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar: 20 tintes de diferentes colores, 30 cremas para cuerpo, 20 cremas para alisado, cremas para tratamiento, 20 pintauñas, pintalabios, 30 perfumenes, maquillaje y 15 faciales para la cara. Con la inversión ella comprara al por mayor, pues su deseo es tener de todo lo que buscan sus clientes y no tener que viajar tan seguido, así ahorrara tiempo y dinero para mejorar sus ganancias.

Ella sueña con tener su propia sala de belleza con todo lo necesario, puesto que hoy en día no cuenta con todas las herramientas que necesitan para brindar una buena atención a sus clientes y emplear a más personal en el negocio. Además desea  ver graduados a sus hijos para que puedan ganarse la vida.
texts.en:
Sandra is 36 years old, divorced, and has 3 children. She lives alone with her three kids since her husband left her and went to another country. Since that happened, she’s fought to get ahead for her kids, and her dream is that they will graduate from school and be good people for the country. 

Sandra has worked in cosmetology for 4 years. She learned that job in a professional school and later opened a beauty salon. She also sells products via catalogue and watches after her kids. She gets up very early to make breakfast and do the housework so that she can later go to work. 

She buys the products that she needs for the beauty salon in the country’s capitol where she goes twice a month. To get there, she takes two buses and a micro-bus. 

The loan that she’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy 20 different colors of dye, 30 body creams, 20 smoothing creams, treatment creams, 20 nail polishes, lipsticks, 30 perfumes, makeup, and facial creams. She will buy in bulk with the loan since her dream is to have everything that her clients want and not to have to continue traveling, at the same time saving time and money in order to increase her income. 

Her dream is to have her own beauty salon with everything that’s needed since now she doesn’t have all the supplies that are needed to provide her customers good service and employ more staff in the business. Also she wants to see her children graduate so that they can succeed in life.

loans.use: to buy 20 different dyes, 30 body creams, 20 smoothing creams, treatment creams, 20 nail polishes, lipsticks, 30 perfumes, makeup, and 15 facials.

loans.name: Garik

texts.en:
Garik is 32 years old. He lives in Horbategh village with his wife and son. Garik works at the local tax service as a tax officer. Unfortunately, Garik's salary is not enough to cover the family's expenses. So Garik also runs a farm, where he keeps beehives and breeds cattle. Currently his farm consists of two cows, two pigs and 10 beehives. 

Garik has applied for this loan to expand his farm. He wants to purchase 10 sheep and two more cows. This is vital for Garik to increase the income from agriculture and insure a prosperous life for his family.

loans.use: to pay for cows and sheep

location.town: Horbategh village of Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
El señor Miguel tiene 30 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 11, 9 y 4 años de edad respectivamente.

Desde hace diez años el aprendió el oficio de sastre, fue un amigo quien le enseño. También trabaja en la agricultura, fue su papá quien le enseño, posee 25 gallinas ponedoras y trabaja como vigilante de unas oficinas por las noches. Su vida es agitada, pero sus sueños son muchos y su deseo es brindarle lo mejor a su familia.

Él compra los productos para la sastrería y los insumos agrícolas en una ciudad del oriente del país, para llegar ahí viaja en la palangana de un pick up y tarda una hora en llegar, realiza sus compras y se regresa a su casa.

El préstamo que esta solicitando Miguel es para comprar un molino de motor. Con esta inversión él recibirá ingresos diarios y mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia, pues desea que sus hijos sean unos profesionales.
texts.en:
Miguel is 30 years old, and he lives with his wife and three kids aged 11, 9, and 4 years old. 

10 years ago he learned how to be a tailor, and it was a friend who taught him. He also works in agriculture, and it was his father who taught him. He has 25 laying hens, and he works as a night watcher in one of the offices. His life is busy, but his dreams are many, and he desires to give his family the best. 

He buys the products for the tailor shop and the agricultural supplies in a city in the east of the country. In order to get there he travels in the bed of a truck, and an hour later he’s there. He makes his purchases and goes back home. 

The loan that Miguel is asking for is to buy a motorized mill. With this investment he’ll get daily income and will improve his family’s quality of like since he hopes that he children will grow up to be professionals.

loans.use: to buy a motorized mill.

loans.name: Khursheed's Group

texts.en:
Khursheed has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the further expansion of her embroidery business. With the loan investment, she will buy beads, embroidery thread, etc. in bulk quantity and of better variety that will allow her to make better looking embroidered clothes and increase her sales and profits.

She is very experienced in her work and confident about her business success as a result of loan investment.

Note: In the picture the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Khursheed.

loans.use: To buy beads and embroidery thread for embroidery business

loans.name: Tarakwa

texts.en:
Tarakwa is 75 years old, married to Jane, and blessed with three children aged 17, six and three. He has a shoe shop alongside farming. He started farming 30 years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 20,000 from farming alone.

 
He has requested a  loan worth KES 55,000 to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer and seeds. The anticipated profit will aid him in repaying his loan. His dream is to lead a better life, and this is his eighth loan.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs including fertilizer and seeds in readiness for the planting season.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is 56 years old. She is married to Joseph, 62 years old. Together they have three children. She operates a stationery shop and also owns rental houses.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a staff member. This is her first loan with KADET LTD. She will use the loan to repair her rental houses.

She hopes to add more rental houses to expand her business.

loans.use: to repair rental houses

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a forty-two-year-old woman; she is married and has  four children. She has been practicing mixed farming for fifteen years now and gets a monthly income of four thousand shillings. 


This will be Mary’s first loan from KADET LTD, and she plans to use the entire loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and for land preparation. 

With the profit that she will get, she wants to buy goats. In future she wants to be able to expand her business and become self-reliant.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizer and do land preparation

loans.name: Isabel Pedro

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Cidade da Matola, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 1 filho que frequenta a 7ª classe. Fez a 6ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos seus pais tempo, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 
	

 Trabalha como servente na empresa da bananalândia há mais de 4 anos e tem um salário de 3.100.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 18.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (blocos, cimento, ferro, pedra, e outros). 

No futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e mobilar, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Isabel Pedro was born in the city of Matola in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is married and is the mother of one son, who is in seventh grade.  She studied through sixth grade and didn't continue due to her parents' lack of financial resources.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone besides them.

She has worked for the company Bananalândia for more than four years and has a salary of 3,100 meticals.  She puts this towards her home's expenses and also saves some in her bank account in the BIM bank.

She has never had a loan with another bank.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is her first loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 18,000 meticals, which she will use to buy construction materials for her home (bricks, cement, iron, stone, etc.).

In the future, she wants to finish her home and furnish it, for which she plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: To buy iron, bricks, cement, and stones to expand her home.

loans.name: Astrid

texts.es: Astrid, de 20 años, es una joven mujer, amable y que siempre le gusta estar en constante búsqueda de nuevos horizontes, es conviviente con Joe de 23 años con quien está empezando una vida de parejas y con él desea hacer su vida y tener hijos y formarlos hasta ser  profesionales. Ella trabaja mucho, pues desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus padres quienes la acogen junto a su pareja en su casa. Durante el tiempo que Astrid lleva a lado de su conviviente, aprendió que para tener algunas comodidades hay que trabajar mucho, es así como al ver la necesidad de generar ingresos en su familia decidió empezar su propio negocio para ayudar en la economía de su hogar. Desde entonces se dedica a la venta de calzados y ropa, diseños que estén a la  vanguardia de la moda. Lleva con su trabajo por aproximadamente 1 año y le está yendo bien en lo que hace ya que tiene buenos clientes y siempre tiene buenas ventas, espera seguir trabajando así y mas adelante poner una tienda para atender con mayor comodidad a sus clientes, el camino es largo y por ahora solo desea aumentar su capital de trabajo. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá mas asegura de avanzar con su negocio, por su parte se compromete una vez mas a seguir siendo una socia cumplida en el pago de sus cuotas, está muy contenta de trabajar junto a los de su banco comunal ya que todos son muy solidarios y muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará más mercadería, entre zapatos, sandalias y prendas de vestir masculino y femenina, ya que desea ampliar su variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes que cada vez aumentan mas.
texts.en:
Astrid, 20 years old, is a friendly young women who’s always on the lookout for new horizons. She’s in a common law marriage with Joe who’s 23 years old and with whom she’s starting a life as a couple. With him she hopes to make a life, have kids, and raise them to be professionals. She works very much since she wants to give her parents, who have welcomed her and her husband into their home, a better quality of life. 

Since the time that Astrid got together with her partner, she learned that in order to have the creature comforts one must work a lot. It was seeing the necessity of generating income for the family that she decided to start her own business in order to help out the family financially. Since then she’s sold shoes and clothes, designs that are on the forefront of fashion. She’s been doing this business for one year, and it’s been going well since she has good customers and always has good sales. She hopes to keep working and later on have a store to provide her customers with more comfort. The road is long and for now she only wants to increase her working capital. 

This will be her second loan with MFP. She is very pleased to know that she will get financial help since she’ll feel more secure in growing her business. For her part she again promises to continue being a member who complies with the terms of her agreement. She’s very happy to work together with those from her communal bank since they are very responsible and team-oriented. 

With the requested amount of 1500 soles, she will buy more merchandise including shoes, sandals, and men’s and women’s garments since she wants to increase the variety of her products in order to more and increase more.

loans.use: to buy shoes, sandals and men's and women's clothing.

loans.name: Afrita Júlio

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, solteira e mãe de 4 filhos dos quais apenas um frequenta a Escola e os outros já estão a trabalhar. Fez a 6ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 1 neta que vive com ela. 
	

 Trabalha como encadernadora de Impressão Gráfica académica há mais de 36 anos e tem um salário de 8.600.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Já teve empréstimo no Barclays e conseguiu pagar sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu quarto empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 16.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (barrotes, janelas, vidros, portas, cimento, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 15.000.00mt, 16.000.00mt, e 30.000.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e mobilar, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Afrita Julio was born in the district of Boane in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is a single mother of four chidren, two of whom are in school.  The other two are already working.  She studied through the sixth grade but stopped due to her parents' lack of financial resources.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports one granddaughter that lives with her.

She has worked as a bookbinder for Impressão Gráfica for more than 36 years.  She has a salary of 8,600 meticals, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account in the BIM bank.

She has had a loan with the Barclays bank and paid it back without any problems.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is her fourth loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 16,000 meticals.  She will use it to buy construction materials for her home (beams, windows, glass, doors, cement, etc.).  Her previous loans were for 15,000, 16,000, and 30,000, and all were applied to her home.

She promises to make her payments on time, and in the future, she wants to finish her home and furnish it.  She is planning on requesting more loans from Hluvuku to do this.

loans.use: to buy beams, windows, glass, doors, cement, etc., to continue construction of her home

loans.name: José Atilio

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 58 años de edad, es casado y tiene cinco hijos pero todos ellos ya tienen su propia familia.

Él se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino, siembra de granos básicos como maíz y maicillo en la temporada agrícola, destazo de ganado y a la comercialización de diferentes aves de corral, cerdos, leña, etc. La crianza de ganado bovino la aprendió de sus padres, ya que ellos desde siempre se han dedicado a estas actividades y las demás actividades las aprendió por su propia cuenta.

Los semovientes para la crianza y el destazo los compra en los tiangues de una ciudad del oriente del país que se encuentra a una distancia de 8 kilómetros desde su casa, para llegar ahí aborda un autobús que tarda de quince a veinte minutos.

Don José solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar tres semovientes para la crianza y el resto para alquiler de la tierra, debido a que se aproxima la temporada agrícola y necesita alquilar la tierra para cultivar. Con la inversión aumentara el número de ganado llegando a cinco, las tres vaquillas que comprara son de ordeño para la producción de leche. De esta manera cubrirá la demanda existente, venderá más y recibirá mayores ingresos con los que planea comprar más ganado para la crianza.
texts.en: José is 58 years old, married and has five children who all have their own families. He makes a living raising cattle, harvesting basic grains like corn and sorghum during planting season, butchering cattle, and selling different kinds of poultry, pigs, firewood, etc. He learned how to raise cattle from his parents, who always made a living that way, and he learned the other activities himself. He buys his livestock at cattle markets in a city in the eastern part of the country about 8 kilometers from his home and a 15-20 minute bus ride. José is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Fundación Campo to purchase three more heads of cattle and to lease land to plant his crops for the upcoming season. This investment will increase the number of cattle he has to five, and the three he buys will be milk cows. In this way he will be able to meet existing demand, sell more and increase his income with the plan to purchase more cattle in the future.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and lease land.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 26-year-old man. He is married and has two children. He runs a motorcycle transport locally known as a boda boda business.  Stephen has been in the business for 2 years now and gets a monthly income of 2000 KES.

This will be Stephen’s first loan with KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to service and fuel the motorbike. With the profit that he will get, he wants to pay his children’s school fees. In the future, he wants to become financially stable.

loans.use: to service and fuel the motorbike.

loans.name: Leonel Eduardo

texts.es:
El señor Leonel tiene 32 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene un hijo. Él se ha dedicado desde los 6 años de edad a realizar actividades agrícolas, fue su papá quien le enseño, trabajaron juntos hasta que Leonel tenia 20 años de edad que él se independizo y formo su familia.

Los insumos agrícolas los compra en el pueblo más cercano que esta a unos 18 kilómetros desde el pueblo hasta el lugar donde lo deja el autobús, luego tiene que trasladar los insumos en su espalda durante un kilómetro para resguardarlos en su casa, después los lleva al lugar donde tiene los cultivos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando don Leonel será para comprar teja, madera, puertas, pago de mano de obra para construir su casa y vivir con su familia, ya que el invierno se aproxima y él quiere terminarla antes. Él tiene una parte de los materiales como adobe para hacer las paredes y el préstamo lo usara para el techo y pago de los albañiles. Su vida mejorara en gran medida ya que se cumplirá su sueño de tener una casa propia donde podrá vivir junto a su familia, ya que actualmente vive en casa de sus suegros. Él desea continuar trabajando para tener mejores ingresos y brindarle una educación muy buena a su hijo y ampliar más su casa para vivir de una mejor manera.
texts.en: Leonel is 32 years old, married and has a son. He has made a living since he was 6 years old in farming, which his parents taught him. He worked alongside his parents until he was 20 years old, when he went out on his own and formed a family. He purchases his farming supplies in the nearest town, which is 18 kilometers away from where he picks up the bus. Then he hauls the supplies on his back for a kilometer when he returns home before taking them to where he has his crops. He is requesting the loan to purchase tile, wood and doors, and to pay for construction work on his home so he can live with his family. Winter is coming and he wants to finish the work before then. He has some of the materials, like adobe for the walls, and will use the loan for the roof and to pay for labor. His life will improve in a big way because it will fulfill his dream of having a home where he can live alongside his family, since currently he lives in the house of his in-laws. He wants to continue working so he can increase his income, provide his son with a good education, and expand his home even more so he and his family can live better.

loans.use: to purchase tile, wood and doors, and pay for construction work on his home.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, de 53 años, es un hombre que durante sus años de vida trabajó siempre para brindar el bienestar a sus cuatro hijos y a su esposa, mediante mucho trabajo logró comprar su casa propia y ahí crió y educo a los suyos. Ahora está separado y vive en una casa que alquila, desde entonces trabajar en diferentes aserraderos de la ciudad, en busca de madera que compra, después los lleva a su taller en donde los da forma y los moldea para ser vendidos a los diversos carpinteros, quienes elaboran muebles. Lleva con su trabajo por más de 20 años y siempre lo hizo solo ya que así se siente mucho más cómodo. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, púes le permite tener sus ingresos y disponer de su propio tiempo, además de hacer lo que siempre le ha gustado desde muy joven, desea tener su taller y hacer él mismo los acabado para los muebles, pero por el momento está tranquilo ya que poco a poco se implementará y espera lograrlo. Este será su primer préstamo con la institución MFP, por lo que está muy contento ya que siempre deseó que alguna entidad le diera la oportunidad de poder crecer junto a su inversión en su negocio. Está muy convencido de ser un cliente puntual y sobre todo no defraudar a la institución que le está permitiendo realizar en parte su sueño. Espera llegar a compenetrarse con su grupo y ser tan responsable y solidario como ellos.
